subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Eli Manning threw interceptions on the 3rd and 12th plays of the game and threw a third in the final minutes as the Giants dropped to 0-6 for the first time since 1976.
snippet: Eli Manning threw interceptions on the 3rd and 12th plays of the game and threw a third in the final minutes as the Giants dropped to 0-6 for the first time since 1976.
